Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: Rachelle R
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful experience at the Jameson. This was my first time at the Jameson, so I didn't know what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised to find such a quality hotel at such a reasonable price. Our room is very cleanly, as is the lobby with free continental breakfast. The best quality of this hotel however is the service. The employee at the front desk was beyond helpful. He not only recommended where to shop, but also printed us a full list of area restaurants and bars to choose from. The only thing that could make our stay better would be a fully stocked fridge in the room. We definitely will be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: rainbowboss
Reviews.Content: The location is on a private road right off I465 very close to the Castleton shopping malls. There is a restaurant next door which is closed as of this report, but is due to open in the fall. This is a well-run and well kept hotel. Rooms are large and clean, actually, spotless. The staff were cheerful and responsive to our needs and well trained. Special thanks to Kyle, the General Manager who went out of his way to make our stay pleasant and provided us with with all the hangers we could ever need :-). Although the bathroom was very small, it was spotless and cleaning services did a great job. All in all, a great place to stay at a good value. Our 5 days went without a hitch.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: brucestar53
Reviews.Content: We recently stay here for a week as our daughter had a baby. The hotel staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. The roon was extremely comfortable and had everything you needed. The location is perfect with easy access to highways, shopping, and restaurants of ALL kinds. The rates were also exceptional!

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cliffsiler
Reviews.Content: A nice hotel to stay at for 4 days. We were working the Superbowl Party eventsetting up so we slept during the day and worked at night. The staff was all very helpful and friendly. The rooms were clean and well stocked. They did have a fridge and microwave. The internet in the room was wireless and a bit weak but adequate. However, the TV Channels were not good at all. There was a Showtime channel, which isn't a very good movie channel and that was it as far as movies go. The rest was Sports, News, Educational and of course the brain rotting reality shows. HaHaHa. The pool was seasonal , outdoor and closed. There was NO Hot Tub to relax in and I didn't see the fitness center. I did see the breakfast outlay one morning but it hadn't been stocked yet as it was still like 5:30am still. That just shows that they were on the ball in that dept. We had truckloads of boxes arriving at the hotel and they accomodated us very nicely as far as accepting and storing them until we could get them into our truck. Like I said it was a nice hotel but without a hot tub, points or some other incentive i would seek a better value elsewhere next time.

Reviews.Title: “customer service”
Reviews.Author: Diana S
Reviews.Content: I stayed recently at this jameson inn and was always welcomed in the morning with a hello and a good morning. The room was always clean and restocked every day (4 nite stay). When I first enter the inn, I was greeted by George in the evening who was able to help me start my stay and would always be helpful with advice and information. I have talked to his manager, Kimberly Jones, and thanked the staff and the manager for a pleasant stay. I would recommed using this hotel every time you go to indianapolis!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfy, and a free breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: Everett S
Reviews.Content: Was looking for an alternative place to stay other than the Holiday Inn-Carribean Cove where I had a bad experience. This was a great choice. Quiet, not expensive, clean sheets and bed, room, neatly appointed, nice free breakfast in the morning, helpful staff. Yes, the bathroom is a tad small, but, hey, it's clean and it was less than $100! What else can you ask for? I'll go back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Easy Access, clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: bstdflsh
Reviews.Content: An older property which has been fairly well maintained. The room I occupied was facing a main street but was quiet with little road noise. The room was large with a refrigerator and microwave. The bathroom however was small and took some manuvering to close the door. Breakfast was standard fare of waffles, biscuits and gravy, juice machine etc.The front desk personnel were scarce for the time I was there (two days) and absent at checkout which happened to be around 5:00AM. A decent place to stay with a clean room, quiet, close to shopping and restaurants and easy access to a main highway.

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: PastorMyrtle M
Reviews.Content: I truly enjoyed my stay at the Jameson Inn. The manager onsite Kimberly Jones was a great help to us. If we needed directions to our destination she was a great help. She was very polite to us and she has a great smile that made you feel so welcome at your hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Two states, same experience”
Reviews.Author: basset55
Reviews.Content: Identical reviews for the Jamesons in Alcoa and northeast Indianapolis because the circumstances and the stay were pretty much the same in both cases - got in late, left early, just needed a place to sleep, clean up, and keep going and the Jamesons worked out fine both times. Had never stayed in one till work booked me into Alcoa - arrived in the dark, went straight to the room (clean, quiet, comfortable, everything worked), had a quick breakfast the next morning (again clean, fresh and a good selection) and hit the road before daylight. Didn't use any of the amenities so I can't comment on those, didn't know there was a walking path out back till I saw the prior review. A few weeks later I was in the middle of a long drive and needed a place to stop and rest awhile. Got one of those motel coupon booklets at a highway rest area, Jameson was in there and the previous experience was good so I called and got the $49.99 coupon rate, pulled in, slept, cleaned up, ate and left. Again, didn't use the exercise room, pool (not even sure they had one) or anything else. Good side of the road pit stop.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel Experience Ever”
Reviews.Author: abmcreynolds
Reviews.Content: I want to say that I have stayed at this Jameson on several occasions before and had a great experience. However, this past weekend was awful. I rented two rooms for my family on Friday and Saturday night. Our first night there 3 bus loads of high school students were there. They were loud and up all night. The next morning, house keeping began banging on doors and cleaning rooms prior to the check out time. So not only were we woken up by all the teens checking out and yelling down halls, we then heard vacuum cleaners and knocking. On Saturday night, I came back to the room early around 6pm. There were 3 rooms across from us screaming loudly and slamming doors. They all said they were getting ready to party. Okay, 6pm loudness no big deal. Then they came back at 11pm. Screaming at the top of their lungs up and down the hallway, whistling, slamming doors, etc. I thought they would calm down but by 11:45pm I was done and called the front desk. I tried to tell the man about what was going on but was rudely told he had someone at the counter and would take care of it when he had time. 20 minutes later, we heard someone knock on the doors near us. He politely asked them to keep it down and said thank you. The group left again after screaming many obscenities loudly when the front desk employee asked them to quiet down. Then they returned at 3:48am (yes, I remember the alarm clock). At least 4 to 5 people were singing in the hallway! This continued with whistling and more screaming. We could also smell cigarette smoke coming into our room. I cannot believe that no one downstairs could hear this. It went on for another hour and no one did anything. I did not call again because of the way I was treated before. My family member in the next room decided to wear earplugs to bed because of the prior night. When we checked out this morning, we were told that the staff Saturday night should have called a management member but did not and also the group would be put on the do not rent list. There was another group of people checking out from the other end of the second floor hallway complaining as well. A young lady, who looked as if she was still drunk and had makeup smudged all over her face, confronted me after I complained and stated that because Indianapolis is a college town and bars close at 3am, we should get used to it. I am in my 20s and have been in college myself. However, I never disrespected others around me as this group did. I cannot believe that the staff just sat back and did nothing. If my employer did not require me to stay at Jameson Inns in the state, I would never stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Its what is on the inside that counts!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ken F
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this hotel and was surprised how nice it was. I got a great deal on hotwire.com ($50), and wasn't sure how nice it would be??? From the outside it doesn't look like much but inside it is super clean and the rooms are nice. If you are looking for something clean and on a budget I would recommend this 100%. Also the staff was very friendly and courteous.

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: dc8Louisville
Reviews.Content: Okay, It's not a 300.00 a night hotel, but that being said, it was clean, safe, and a nice hotel for the money. I would stay there again in a minute.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: cwmoore
Reviews.Content: We were "assigned" this hotel via hotwire. Great place. The recent remodeling is very nice. Very comfortable bed. Very nicely decorated. Good breakfast. Front desk extremely friendly. Only suggestions: 1) Add "slip prevention slips" in the bathtubs. 2) Upgrade towels 3) Add a few items to the breakfast bar so that some options are offered in addition to the high carb diet...what is available is very good but additions i.e. eggs, yogurt would be nice. We would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Another Good Experience At Jameson”
Reviews.Author: mskerr
Reviews.Content: Purchased room thru Hotwire ($41) not knowing it was going to be Jameson, which I have had good experiences at. Got great rate for a good, clean large room with comfy bed, although the bathroom (toilet and tub room) was tiny. Hotel is right off the interstate (south side of road) with tall visible sign. Breakfast was typical, carb-heavy offering but not disapointing, although the OJ from the machine was awful. Many chain restaurants on other side of highway, as well as shopping. Only stayed one night, and I would stay again. Check in and checkout staff were very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay during MotoGP”
Reviews.Author: SurRea1
Reviews.Content: After reading horrible reviews for the hotels located next to the speedway, I have stumbled upon mostly positive reviews for this hotel and was not disappointed. Great, clean and affordable hotel. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Norjean
Reviews.Content: This was the first of 5 hotels over 7 nights; What a surprise! Reserved through Hotline for $38 (yes! $38 excluding taxes). Room was 'roomy'; service was pleasant; breakfast was ok nothing special; Hotel was exceptionally clean. Only concerns were 1) hotel over zealous with air freshener. When you first walk in you think, wow, they keep this place fresh but throughout stay the freshener seemed to seep through everything. I even asked the staff if it somehow was coming through the vents. 2) room bathroom (toilet and tub area) quite small. Overall though this was a pleasant place for us to crash after 12 hours driving. Bonus: shopping center across the street to walk to!

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, clean, good location. Three years in a row, I'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Roger M
Reviews.Content: I've lived in Indy for 15 years before retiring & moving to be near family. I go back once a year to visit with friends. I've stayed at an Indy northside Jameson the last three years. The locations are safe & easily accessible with restaurants & shopping nearby. The interstate system is easily accessible for any side of Indy. I have found the staff & management to be pleasant & accommodating. The rooms are clean & quiet - once I'm in the room, the outside world stayed outside. The next morning I was rested & looking forward to my day. My experiences with this chain have been a no surprise experience.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, especially for the money!”
Reviews.Author: indyhug111
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights for a softball tournament. We booked our hotel thru hotwire (1st time doing so) and was very pleased. The hotel breakfast was great, the rooms were oversized, the beds were very comfy, bath fixtures very modern. The tub had some plaster cracking away though. The outdoor pool was very warm, and very large! In a nice partially shaded, pretty private area. The trees around it, though, did make for lots of leaves in the pool. The hotel staff was so friendly, asking about how our team was (both housekeepers and desk staff). The fridge and micro in the room were very nice. The TVs in the room could use an update. The mantra here is clean clean clean. They cleaned all of the lobby glass our first day there, and used a floor polisher machine to clean the lobby floors also. The rooms were very clean, and carpet throughout appeared to be very new. The only bad part was that shockingly they still have smoking rooms, and the smell goes throughout the hotel. Also, their is no non-stop fan on the room temp controls, so there is no way to have continual noise all night, and we could hear the tv of the room next to ours. Overall though, it was exceptional!

Reviews.Title: “Nice surprise!”
Reviews.Author: dpadgett1
Reviews.Content: Our softball team booked with Jameson Inn for girl's softball nationals. Hotel is very clean and someone is always at front desk. Loved the matching uniforms the housekeepers had, they were also very nice and helpful. Breakfast was ok, waffel makers are nice.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: SNYDERST
Reviews.Content: Rolling the dice on Hotwire trying to take advantage of a great single night rate we found ourselves at the Jameson Inn in Indy. Once we found the name of the hotel, we searched tripadvisor.com for reviews. All seemed very good and our experience will echo those reviews. It was the exact location we wanted and could not beat the price. Room was very spacious and clean. For families on a budget who may be traveling with children, our two-bed room could have easily accommodated two additional roll-a-way beds. Breakfast was not to our desire. We'll try to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Ddell_10
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly and intelligent. The hallways were well lit and clean. The room smelled and looked clean. All of the furniture was new. The internet was fast. The breakfast in the morning was very good. I stay in hotels multiple times a month and this was the best by far in the last year!

Reviews.Title: “We loved it, and will stay there whenever possible”
Reviews.Author: pawla34761
Reviews.Content: The free breakfast was delicious. Biscuits and gravy, and waffles. Coffee all the time. The best value for the money on our12 night trip

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and convenient!”
Reviews.Author: LT78
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the night before the Indy500 and were very happy with our stay. The hotel had lots of restaurants and shopping nearby. The service was great, the personnel behind the front desk were friendly and extremely helpful. We had a room on the 2nd floor and it was very nice. The rooms were neat, clean and modern. There was a small fridge and microwave in our room which was very convenient. Had a nice hot shower, with great water pressure! Overall, our stay was very nice and we would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Thank You!”
Reviews.Author: TravelBarbieGirl
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to take a moment to comment on my very comfortable stay at the Castleton location in Indianapolis on March 8th and 9th. I was in town for one evening for a training event that was being held at the hotel. Even though that location does not have a shuttle, one of their other locations was kind enough to come and pick me up at the airport and take me back the following day. From the moment I called to make my reservations to the moment that I left, EVERY single person that I was lucky enough to come in contact with was absolutely wonderful to deal with. Kyle the manager went out of his way to accommodate the shuttle service. Brian at the front desk was a delight each time I called (and it was quite a few), and Michelle, the shuttle driver ( I think she was from the Carmel location) was a very sweet endearing individual who made the 30 minute drive to and from the airport a pleasure. Thank you for making my stay a pleasurable one. I truly appreciated their kindness and hospitality!

Reviews.Title: “Going the extra mile in Castleton Indiana”
Reviews.Author: Happycustomer072
Reviews.Content: I was at the Castleton Jameson Inn during a terrible snowstorm. One of my business companions was stuck on the highway. She had been stopped for over an hour and was running out of gas. She called me and asked me to find out what was going on. I tried to contact the Indiana State Police but the lines were jammed because of so many accidents that had occurred. I spoke to Brandi (The lady at the front desk) and she got me through to the Indiana State Police. I was so grateful and Brandi was so efficient and kind. My friend made it to the hotel hours later but it was comforting to know that the staff at Jameson Inn at Castleton had been willing to go the extra mile to help. Thanks Brandi and thanks Jameson Inn Castleton, Indiana.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay! Will Stay again!”
Reviews.Author: travelgurugurl
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel by hotwire for one night, for a concert I was attending too. What a great hotel! The location was perfect close to restaurants and shopping and only 10 miles away to the verizon center. Our room was very nice and clean. We had a king size bed and our room was very spacious. The only negative thing was the hallway smelled like old cigaratte smoke but once you get into your room it was fine. Next time I am in Indy, I will definitely book this hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the Price”
Reviews.Author: Tamhicks10
Reviews.Content: I booked this room for 2 nights through hotwire. The lobby is very nice and the staff at the counter was also friendly. I really am VERY happy with the room considering how much I paid for it! I booked the room for a REAL cheap price. Pros - Bed was comfy, cable TV, microwave, fridge, free wifi, coffee maker, outdoor pool, and desk in the room. Cons - The hallway that I had to walk down to get to my room smelled REALLY strong like cigarette smoke and that smell had slightly seeped into the non smoking room I had. There was no shampoo or conditioner. So I assumed that I needed to purchase some. After I paid (only $1 for a little travel size deal), I asked if maybe there was some in the room I had missed. The gal at the desk said that there should have been some in the room and gave me 2 extra. There were some hairs in the tub and a yellow (looked like soap) mess on the floor. So I know that it has not been mopped. There was also a hair tie left on the counter. I could hear people talking in their rooms when I was in the hallway. Very friendly people, GREAT location (I ate across the street at 5 Guys and it took all my will not to go across the street for some retail therapy - a lot of stores).

Reviews.Title: “OMG this is a very nice hotel. For the price I paid I didn't know what I was getting us into.”
Reviews.Author: jodie765
Reviews.Content: Ok when we pulled up I thought " it looks ok, when I entered I thought wow this is nice. We just stayed in a three star hotel in Memphis, TN and we like this room just as much. We will definately use hotwire from now on and we would definately recommend this hotel.Oh Yah we really enjoyed their outdoor pool. It is outside to the side of the hotel which made it very private.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: wvuengr12
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very clean, we stayed fours days and never heard any noise from other rooms, check in and out was easy, breakfast was average and was from 6:00 to 9:30 and staff was friendly. Location was very nice. Lots of restaurants and shopping within a half mile. We would gladly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Safe Location, friendly service, easy access, lots of choices”
Reviews.Author: Foxes999
Reviews.Content: Jameson Inn was a fantastic value. The location was good -right off highway, and appeared safe. There was lots of food choices (and shopping). Room was nice. front desk busy but very helpful. Breakfast was nice. Definitely will stay here again when visiting the Northeast side of Indianapolis.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome staff”
Reviews.Author: carlajo111
Reviews.Content: Rooms were very comfortable and clean. Staff was very helpful with all our needs. We stayed for an entire week 2 times during the month of September. Staff went above and beyond and were very courteous and helpful with any and all of our needs. Will definately stay here when in the area again. Rates were good as well. Carla

Reviews.Title: “Simply Terrific!”
Reviews.Author: LakeManVirginia
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd stay.....and there will be many more! It's our favorite stop on our quarterly road trip to see the grandkids in Chicago. Conveniently close to the highway, but also close to loads of convenient shopping; very friendly, actively helpful staff; price can't be beat....amazing bargain for the quality; hotel/rooms very clean and comfortable; rooms not gigantic, but everything you need...very comfortable bed, chair w/ ottoman, refrigerator and microwave, etc., etc.; flawless wireless Internet access; terrific Continental breakfast; and a drink/snack room to die for!!! What's not to love?!

Reviews.Title: “Much nicer than expected”
Reviews.Author: natjaye
Reviews.Content: Provided better than basic room and service. Exceeded my expectations with a Very comfortable bed, flatscreen TV and quiet, well kept common areas. The only drawback is the location, although with easy access to I-465, is next to a casino and car wash, not much of a view. But overall, would definitely stay again. Got a great rate on hotwire too.

Reviews.Title: “Housekeeping?”
Reviews.Author: hoosiermama81
Reviews.Content: The rooms were deplorable. My sheets were dirty and my bed wasn't even made!! There was even a dirty towel hanging on the back of the door. I called the front desk to be moved to a clean room & I was given so much hassle!! The tub was also stained pink.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Quiet”
Reviews.Author: Hathaway0715
Reviews.Content: My husband, mother-in-law, sister-in-law, and I stayed Saturday 10/18 in rooms 216 & 219. The rooms were clean and decorated nicely with granite countertops and tan/black decor. Beds were very comfortable. I didn't use the coffee maker, fridge, or iron, but all were clean. What impressed me was the professionalism of the staff. When I called in the morning of to ask them about staying there that night, they knew my last name and acted like they already had my room assigned. When I checked in, again, they greeted me with my name. I only had coffee at the breakfast bar, but my in-laws said they had a very nice assortment. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “a real letdown”
Reviews.Author: GoGeorgiaDogs
Reviews.Content: I dont need anything fancy when I stay away from home, BUT, this was not a good experience. We booked adjoining rooms almost a year before we stayed. The rooms were confirmed the day before we got there and then when we did get there, we were informed that they had given one of the rooms away. Ok, not such a big deal. At least we still had two rooms. The first night, the sheets wouldnt stay on the bed. (too small) This was Nascar race weekend and everyone in Indiana knew this except apparently for the management at the hotel. The desk staff was friendly, but the other help was way understaffed. When we tried to have breakfast, we found no sausage gravy, no waffle mix and no orange juice. Unless you wanted toast, bagels or muffins, you were out of luck. I thought for sure the next morning would be better, but it was not. Once again they ran out of a lot of the breakfast options. The bathroom was very small and the tub was in rough shape. Two positives were the price (no one would stay there if they charged more) and the location. It was easy to get to off of the highway.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: BakeMorePlease
Reviews.Content: Apparently there was a race on in Indy so lodging was a bit scarce. It was essentially our only choice in our price range. Now, we wish we'd have gone ahead and paid a little more. The front desk staff were a bit slow but friendly. The first room we were assigned had smeared pizza on the carpet and when we alerted the staff they more than happy to assign us a new room. The hotel is sporting a banner that announces that they have all new rooms which isn't all together true. It appears some of the decor and bedding are fairly new, but the airconditioner wasn't and the bathroom tub wasn't either. The bathroom, overall, was not satisfactory. The sink faucet hadn't been properly installed and leaked water everytime you turned it on. The bathroom itself was tiny and we bumped our elbos and shoulders several times. The fixture that had been placed over the tub was cheap with the paint/surface peeling off in huge sheets. The beds were fairly comfortable, but one of the bed skirts was dirty and I couldn't help but be bothered by the stain everytime I looked at it. Housekeeping comes around quite early which is frustrating if you are looking to sleep in past 8:30. Doesn't matter whether you place the "Do not Disturb" sign on the door or not because the door and walls are so thin, when they knock on your neighbors door it's like they knocking on yours. The hotel offers breakfast but this info was nowhere when I booked on line and no one bothered to mention it when we checked in so we ate elsewhere. Overall, if you can find somewhere else to say, I'd advise you to do so. The location is convenient but aside from that, the place is lacking.

Reviews.Title: “Nice room at the Jameson Inn”
Reviews.Author: Georgetraveller
Reviews.Content: We were delighted to see that the room had been refurbished. Great location for our needs and the staff was pleasant. We found a coupon book at the visitor center on the Illinois/Indiana border. It gave us a better price than we got online.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, but not great”
Reviews.Author: Toering
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel with Hotel.com which had good reviews of this place. Well, those were wrong and I will only trust Tripadvisor.com from now on as they have been spot on. The good: The room had a refrigerator. The place was clean, they had our reservation right, the room itself was spacious. HOWEVER, there was a big cigarette burn in our bedspread, towels were thin, bathroom was tiny and the bathtub was peeling, they only gave one shampoo (no lotion). The breakfast was nice, but no one was there to get more waffle mix from. They ran out of coffee and didn't refill it. I will say the people were friendly. I just wouldn't choose this place again.

Reviews.Title: “Nasty and Smelled Bad”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stopped at what I think they call the Indianapolis East location. There was a bad odor when we walked in the door. Like mopping with dirty mop water. When we got in our room it smelled like mildew. The carpet looked like it had not been cleaned in years. There were dirty spots all over the walls and mildew around the edge of the bathtub. We were grossed out and had to leave.

HotelInfo.Name: Jameson Inn of Indy Castleton
HotelInfo.Address: 8380 Kelly Lane, Indianapolis, IN 46250 (Formerly Signature Inn)
